name: Brisbane Milton Bed and Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Brisbane Bed and Breakfast was excellent.
reviews.title: Exquisitely welcoming accommodation

reviews.text: The hosts Maryanne & Philip were friendly, helpful & welcoming. We enjoyed our room with "the old world ambience" and the luxury of modern conveniences. We savoured the delicious breakfasts served to us each morning and we appreciated Maryanne & Philip's efforts to make us feel "special." Thank you too for the 'edible treats' left out in the evening in the breakfast room ( where the tea and coffee making facilities are) a thoughtful touch!
reviews.title: Old world charm in the middle of Brisbane

reviews.text: The location of this B&B is wonderful - close to Paddington and the City - and a short walk to the delightful Rosalie village.
reviews.title: Really nice b and b

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We used T/A to find this wonderful B&B and it was a great choice.
reviews.title: Friendly and charming B&B - highly recommended!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When I stepped into my room I could not believe my eyes! A complimentary bottle of wine was placed on an antique table in a very beautifully decorated room. Every detail was perfect and made you feel as though you had stepped back into a bit of 19th Century luxury. A very modern bathroom completed a wonderfully comfortable living area, inclusive of my own private verandah. Philip and Maryanne were very welcoming and could not do enough to accommodate my needs. The only negative of my stay is that it was for work and I was alone - I felt that the beauty of it all was wasted on me. I intend to bring my husband back with me for a romantic weekend away.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay - close to everything!

description: Boutique Brisbane accommodation in an authentic ‘Queenslander’ built in the 1800s, situated close to hospitals, restaurants, Suncorp Stadium, Brisbane CBD and Milton Business District. Take a short walk along the Brisbane River to the Brisbane CBD and Southbank Cultural Precinct. Each of our rooms has a luxurious ensuite bathroom. Enjoy breakfast on a sunny verandah surrounded by gorgeous tropical plants. The breakfast menu includes a variety of seasonally influenced fruit dishes as well as your choice of a continental or delicious cooked breakfast. You can look forward to something absolutely scrumptious served with a choice of teas and freshly ground coffee.
